content: Navigating the area to find all the bosses can be tricky, so we've suggested a route to take with the way we've listed bosses below. However, you can find these bosses at any time and tackle them in any order you wish (except for the Emeraled-Armed Mantis, which must be done last out of the main bosses). It’s also worth noting that you’ll go up against various bosses and mini-bosses that use some of the four banes, so you may want to swap your gear, curios, and spirits regularly.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Secret Chest'.
The content is as follows:
Navigating the area to find all the bosses can be tricky, so we've suggested a route to take with the way we've listed bosses below. However, you can find these bosses at any time and tackle them in any order you wish (except for the Emeraled-Armed Mantis, which must be done last out of the main bosses). It’s also worth noting that you’ll go up against various bosses and mini-bosses that use some of the four banes, so you may want to swap your gear, curios, and spirits regularly.
